revised_title: Confirmation of Sulphur Presence in Hotter Stars
tldr: The author, Sir Norman Lockyer, investigates the presence of sulphur in the spectra of hotter stars using spectroscopy. He finds evidence of sulphur lines in the spectrum of Rigel and other stars, confirming previous conclusions about the presence of sulphur in hotter stars. The author also discusses the behavior of sulphur lines in laboratory and stellar spectra, and the possible disappearance of certain lines under certain conditions.
